summary:
Standalone vampire follower - high resolution textures, high poly meshes, CITRUS head and a custom outfit.

UNP / CBBE / 7B - with HDT body physics and optional HDT hair. Also optional 'lore-friendly' RED vampire eyes!
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6646117-1462393215.jpg[/img]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Background[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]When Carmella eventually came to, she found herself slumped and shivering on the cold, icy floor of a small, dark room. The incessant sound of dripping rang in her ears, occasionally interrupted by the piercing howl of a wolf. Where was she? Her memory was still hazy and her head throbbed with pain. She sat up and looked down at her pale, lifeless hands and then around the room. She could make out the vague shape of a gate, one on either side of the frozen chamber where she was sat and beyond that, the faint glimmer of candlelight. How did she come to be in such a place? As she sat there in the dark trying to make sense of everything, the fragmented memories which had all but abandoned her gradually began to return.

Accompanied by two guards, she had set out from the College of Winterhold, travelling to Falkreath, where she was to become the new court wizard to Jarl Siddgeir. But at some point during the journey they had run into a fierce blizzard and become lost. Her memories after this point are too faint to make out.. the howl of wolves, galloping hooves, unfamiliar voices, the terrified screams of her companions .. and then being thrown from her horse. She wasn't quite sure how much time had passed since then or how long she had been in that icy cell but she felt strange.. different somehow. And.. hungry. Although it was a hunger she had never felt before, a craving which permeated her entire body and soul and filled her mind with terrible, unspeakble thoughts. Was this some kind of dark magic or dreadful nightmare?

Her thoughts were interrupted by the sound of voices and approaching footsteps and as she looked up, she could make out two shadowy figures standing at the door, peering through the bars. Carmella tried to speak but her mouth was dry and no words came out.
"Welcome to your new home", said a soft, seductive voice. "We have been waiting for you. In fact we have known of your travel plans for quite some time, thanks to our informers in Falkreath. You will no longer be serving Jarl Siddgeir, but instead the Master of Bloodlet Throne".
The gate was unlocked and the two figures entered.
"Come, he is waiting to meet you. Do not be afraid. You are.. one of us now". As the realization of what had happened dawned on Carmella, an intense feeling of terror began to consume her. 

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/6646117-1462399720.png[/img]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Mod Notes[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][About the Character][/size]

[size=3][b]Name : [/b]Carmella
[b]Location [/b]: Bloodlet Throne
[b]Class [/b]: Combat Mage Conjurer
[b]Race[/b] : Imperial Vampire
[b]Level[/b] : 10 - 90 (levels up with PC)
[b]Marriable[/b] : Open to proposals
[b]Custom Outfit[/b]: Mystic Enchantress and KS Jewellery[/size][size=3]

Carmella is a  STANDALONE FOLLOWER and uses her own unique, custom-layered skin textures and body shape. She has high-poly body meshes, including an HD [color=#ff7700]CITRUS[/color] head, which has been hand sculpted and polished in RM. There are three body types to choose from: [color=#ff7700]7B[/color], [color=#ff7700]UNP[/color] and [color=#ff7700]CBBE[/color] - all with [color=#ff7700]HDT[/color] body physics. I've also included 'lore-friendly' vampire eyes in the optional files.

Her custom outfit is Mystic Enchantress by by Alecu, converted for all body types with added HDT (all credits and links below). I have removed the HDT High Heels dependency from the original mod and replaced it with a NiOveride system instead. The textures for the outfit have also been resized and compressed from 4K down to 2K for smoother gameplay.

Carmella can be found in the ice cell of Bloodlet Throne.

[b]Optional HDT hair[/b]

In Carmella's inventory, you will find the HDT version of her hair, which she will equip automatically as 'light armour' when she accepts your invitation to join you as a follower. A common issue with HDT hair for followers is the (occasional) invisible glitch when travelling between cells. This can be fixed in-game by going into console mode, click on the character and disable /enable. If this is too much of an issue, simply remove the wig from her inventory. You have the option.

[b]All files have been cleaned with TES5Edit[/b]

[Installing/Uninstalling]

Download Manager advised.[/size]

[color=#0000ff][size=4][b]Version Log
[/b][/size][/color][size=3]
1.1 - Update
Minor adjustment to face morphs (re-positioned brows slightly lower)
Swapped specular maps for 'Goosebumps' version
Changed Ai Attributes from 'brave / aggressive' to 'foolhardy / unaggressive'
1.0 - Initial release
[/size][/font][/size]
[youtube]G_dZDmsKsPw[/youtube] [youtube]hmcpsV57-MU[/youtube]

[/font][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#dd7e6b][size=4][b]Permissions[/b][/size][/color][/font][color=#dd7e6b]

You may [b]not [/b]upload this mod to any other site without my consent. You may, however, link back to this page from another site.
If you wish to use any of the components from this mod for your own mod, you must credit the mod authors (as listed).
You may [b]not [/b]use the FaceGenData, diffuse textures or body meshes from this character for your own character without my permission, if you then intend to upload it somewhere, 

[/color][/center]
